rxitect.featurization module¶

class rxitect.featurization.SelfiesEncodings(selfies_list: List[str], selfies_vocab: List[str], longest_selfies_len: int)¶

Bases: object

A class representing SELFIES encodings generated from a list of SMILES.

longest_selfies_len: int¶
selfies_list: List[str]¶
selfies_vocab: List[str]¶
rxitect.featurization.generate_selfies_encodings(file_path: str) → rxitect.featurization.SelfiesEncodings¶

Generates encoding, alphabet and length of largest molecule in SELFIES, given a file containing SMILES molecules. :param file_path: path to csv file with SMILES column. Column’s name must be ‘smiles’.

Returns

A collection of SELFIES encodings generated from a list of SMILES.

Return type

SelfiesEncodings
